subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: Resi Stiegler, one of the United States ski team’s most gifted slalom skiers, crashed in training at Copper Mountain, Colo., and was taken off the mountain on a sled.
snippet: Resi Stiegler, one of the United States ski team’s most gifted slalom skiers, crashed in training at Copper Mountain, Colo., and was taken off the mountain on a sled.
